doc:
Lucia Chase https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lucia_Chase 0 Lucia Chase (24 March 1897 in Waterbury, Connecticut – 9 January 1986 in New York City, United States) was an American dancer, actress, ballet director and also the co-founder of the American Ballet Theatre. Lucia_Chase ( 24_March_1897 in Waterbury , Connecticut – 9_January_1986 in New_York_City , United_States ) was an_American_dancer , actress , ballet_director and also the_co-founder of the_American_Ballet_Theatre .
